title: Mihindu Seth Medura: Defence Ministry builds new centre for disabled war heroes
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix By: Sudath Silva) “Mihindu Seth Medura”, a new shelter for the gallant soldiers who dedicated their services for the victory of the motherland was ceremoniously opened by President Mahinda Rajapaksa this morning on 30 May. The two storied new building is located in Attidiya, Dehiwala on an area…
